Journal.Title: Zhongguo Zhong yao za zhi = Zhongguo zhongyao zazhi = China journal of Chinese materia medica

Article.ArticleTitle: [An approach to some problems on utilization of medicinal plant resource in China].

AbstractText: To provide some reference for the research on the utilization of medicinal plant resources.

Based on a review of the achievements in utilizing medicinal plant resources, three aspects were discussed: the utilization and conservation of the endangered and rare medicinal plants; the research on the authenticity and superiority of medicinal plants; and the quality control and evaluation of medicinal plants.
Although great achievements have been made, some problems still exist.
The research on the development and utilization of medicinal plant resources has broad prospects.
